name: dialup-deploy
description: A simple way to deploy websites with automatic SSL and subdomains

scripts.build:all: bun run clear:dist && bun run build:tsc && bun run build:bun
scripts.build:bun: bun run build:core && bun run build:actions && bun run build:server && bun run build:cli
scripts.clear:dist: rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -f packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.setup:local: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun packages/cli/dist/index.js setup local
scripts.setup:production: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun packages/cli/dist/index.js setup production
scripts.setup: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun packages/cli/dist/index.js setup local
